roleset.name: teach, having an education
roleset.note: EDUCATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'educate' based on wsj; nominal 'educating' based on BOLT-6; adjectival 'educated' based on BOLT-7. Member of VNcls advise-37.9 (from educate.01-v)
EDUCATION-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. No Vncls. (from education.01-n)
EDUCATED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from educated.01-j)
EDUCATING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from educating.01-n)

roles.note: Args 1 and 2 reversed from 'teach'. (from educate.01-v) agent appears only very rarely, it seems. (from education.01-n)

example.name: educate-v: just transitive
example.text: They-1 feel the need from time to time *trace*-1 to `educate' me.''

example.name: educate-v: sentential subject (by which I mean object)
example.text: Still, says Mr. Lee: ``We-1 need *trace*-1 to educate people that they need to get to a phone somehow, some way, to let someone know what their status is.''
example.arg: they need to get to a phone somehow, some way, to let someone know what their status is

example.name: educate-v: prepositional subject
example.text: If [the media]-1 decide *trace*-1 to work harder at *trace*-1 educating the public about these complex and technical issues, that hardly can be termed non-objective journalism.
example.arg: about these complex and technical issues

example.name: educating-n
example.text: Farinaccio was born of humble parents, but not so uuprovided with Fortune's gifts as to prevent their educating him in the liberal studies ;

example.name: educated-j
example.text: Hoping one 's own sons to have bright future and hoping one 's own daughters have a bright future are the wishes of Chinese families generation after generation . Being well educated and reasonable is a historical rule throughout Chinese history . Spoiling kids and making decisions on their behalf is normal in many modern one - kid - only families in China . Improving enrollment rates is currently the educational goal of many schools .

example.name: educated-j: adjectival!!!!
example.text: But the kids with highly educated parents did 68% less housework than those in less-educated families.

example.name: education-n: higher education: arg2
example.text: The crush of business professionals fighting for a spot in the MBA program at Taiwan 's most illustrious institution of higher education - National Taiwan University ...
